title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Post Offices
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services     Post Offices                Post Offices        Old log-cabin post office with park ranger and others standing in front. Sign above door reads "Ranger Post Office."          NPS Photo        Two post offices offer varied services in the parks: At Lodgepole Village in Sequoia National Park Letter-drop only (mail must have postage). Open 24 hours; not staffed. Behind the Lodgepole Visitor Center and Market. For backpacking resupply packages: Use the Grant Grove Post Office mailing address below for a resupply point. At Grant Grove Village in Kings Canyon National Park North of the visitor center and gift shop in the same building as the market. Staffed; hours may. Lobby open 24 hours for dropping off mail with postage). Address visitor mail and backpackers' resupply packages to: c/o General Delivery, Kings Canyon NP, CA 93633. 559-335-2499 Closest post office outside Sequoia National Park Three Rivers Post Office, 40857 Sierra Drive (Highway 198) in Three Rivers, CA 93271, 7 miles west of the Sequoia park entrance. Full service. 559-561-4261
